Setting up my R environment

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

First, trying to import the XLSX of country_info


```{r}
library(readxl)

country_info = read_excel("rawData/country-info.xlsx")

sapply(country_info, class)

```

Second, import and view owid-covid-data

```{r}

originalCovid = read.csv(file = "rawData/owid-covid-data.csv")

originalCovid %>%
   mutate(date = as.Date(date, format = "YYYYDDMM")) %>%
    inner_join(country_info, c("location" = "Country_Name"))

sapply(originalCovid, class)
head(originalCovid)

```
